name: Microsoft.Graph.Core
description: Microsoft Graph Core Client Library implements core functionality used by Microsoft Graph Client Libraries.
title: Microsoft Graph Core Client Library

packOptions.summary: Microsoft Graph Core Client Library implements core functionality used by Microsoft Graph Client Libraries.
packOptions.releaseNotes:
November 2016 Release Summary (version 1.3.0)

New features

* Added LINQ support for $select and $expand query options.

Bug fixes

* Fixed an issue in BaseRequest.cs so that query options can support a sub-query option.
* Added missing configureAwait(false) in BaseRequest.cs to address potential deadlock scenario.
